r2b.apps.base

Class BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • r2b.apps.base.BaseActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2, KeyEvent.Callback, LayoutInflater.Factory, LayoutInflater.Factory2, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, Window.Callback, BaseDialog.BaseDialogListener

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends FragmentActivity
implements BaseDialog.BaseDialogListener
    Wrapper for activity main functionality. Manage fragment back stack, preferences, main click listener, a singleton dialog fragment. Manage activity life cycle.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BaseActivity.CallableBackFragment
      Add support to fragments to receive from activity back events.

        public void switchFragment(Fragment fragment,
                  String tag,
                  boolean addToStack)
        Switch between fragments.
        Parameters:
        fragment - The new fragment.
        tag - The tag to identify the fragment.
        addToStack - True to add to back stack, false otherwise.

      • clearBackStack

        public void clearBackStack()
        Clear the back stack to its initial state. Normally with the first fragment setted when activity is created firstly.
